body_html:
I would recommend using at least gcc 4.8, that's the first one that has proper C++11 support:
https://gcc.gnu.org/projects/cxx-status.html
The errors you're seeing seem related to the C++11 features that 4.7 is missing.

body:
I would recommend using at least gcc 4.8, that's the first one that has proper C++11 support:
https://gcc.gnu.org/projects/cxx-status.html
The errors you're seeing seem related to the C++11 features that 4.7 is missing.
